channel.title: 🏢 Ningbo Institute of Digital Twin, Eastern Institute of Technology on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Ningbo Institute of Digital Twin, Eastern Institute of Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Graph-based Unsupervised Disentangled Representation Learning via Multimodal Large Language Models
item.description: GEM, a novel framework, uses a bidirectional graph and MLLMs to achieve fine-grained, relation-aware disentanglement in unsupervised representation learning, surpassing existing methods.
